issue.title: Trusty: remote_endpoint: Transport endpoint is not connected

content.raw: I've sent a small test and a debdiff patch to the [Ubuntu bug](https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/boost-defaults/+bug/1319338). This should speed up things for the SRU bugs affecting Trusty. If it is not fixed during the weekend, we can build and host our modified copy of libboost asio, although I would prefer have it fixed directly in Ubuntu.
content.html: I've sent a small test and a debdiff patch to the Ubuntu bug. This should speed up things for the SRU bugs affecting Trusty. If it is not fixed during the weekend, we can build and host our modified copy of libboost asio, although I would prefer have it fixed directly in Ubuntu.
